Uses of Interface
nl.inl.blacklab.index.DocIndexerFactory

  • Packages that use DocIndexerFactory 
    Package Description
    nl.inl.blacklab.index
    Classes related to indexing.

    • Uses of DocIndexerFactory in nl.inl.blacklab.index

      Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.index that implement DocIndexerFactory 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DocIndexerFactoryClass
      Supports creation of several types of DocIndexers implemented directly in code.
      class  DocIndexerFactoryConfig
      A DocIndexerFactory implementation that automatically adds configurations in the formats/ dir in the jar and scans the default config directories for subdirectories called "config", then loads any configurations within those directories.
      Methods in nl.inl.blacklab.index that return DocIndexerFactory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static DocIndexerFactory DocumentFormats.getFactory(String formatIdentifier)
      Returns the factory which will be used to create the DocIndexer registered under this formatIdentifier.
      Methods in nl.inl.blacklab.index with parameters of type DocIndexerFactory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void DocumentFormats.registerFactory(DocIndexerFactory fac)
      Register a new factory.
